forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 50F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
